tool_description: An API that returns the URL and label of images related to a keyword, and also a list of related searches.
name: Image Search API
title: Image Search API

api_list.name: /image-search
api_list.description:
Returns the list of images and related searches based on the **q** keyword.
If you want to make your search more specific based on a color use the **imgc** param, otherwise don't add it or leave it blank.
